key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on third-party manufacturers
Intense competition from tech giants like Amazon and Google
Challenges with subscription model growth and customer retention
Data privacy and security concerns, including ongoing lawsuits
controversies: Lawsuits alleging violations of biometric privacy laws
Customer concerns over subscription costs and necessity
environmental_issues: Commitment to reducing environmental impact and ensuring responsible sourcing of minerals
social_issues: Data privacy and cybersecurity concerns affecting customer trust
Workforce reductions as part of cost-cutting measures
governance_issues: Legal battles related to privacy violations and ethical sourcing compliance
